mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `share` SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, relId = #{relId}, requesterId = #{requesterId}, requesteeId = #{requesteeId}
mapper.select: SELECT S.* , M.id AS extra__member_id , M.name AS extra__member_name , M.nickname AS extra__member_nickname , M.email AS extra__member_email , M.cellphoneNo AS extra__member_cellphoneNo FROM `share` AS S LEFT OUTER JOIN `member` AS M ON S.requesterId = M.id WHERE S.requesteeId = #{requesteeId} AND S.answer = 1
SELECT S.* ,M.name AS extra__member_name FROM `share` AS S LEFT OUTER JOIN member AS M on S.requesteeId = M.id WHERE relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode} AND FIND_IN_SET(#{relId},S.relId);

SELECT S.* , M.loginId AS extra__requesterLoginId , M.name AS extra__requesterName , M.name AS extra__requesterNickname FROM `share` AS S LEFT OUTER JOIN `member` AS M ON S.requesteeId = M.id WHERE S.requesteeId = #{requesteeId} AND answer = 0
